name: Half Empty
description:
Half Empty is a 2D/3D minimalist platformer! I strongly discourage watching the trailer prior to playing the game.

This was my first complete game that I made! The game was made ENTIRELY by me. I created all of the 2D art, 3D art, Textures, sound effects, and music. I also handled all of the programming and writing.

Controls

XBOX Gamepad (Preferred method)

Left joystick - moves the player
Right joystick - moves the camera
A button - Jump

Mouse and Keyboard

Up Arrow / W - Moves the player forward
Left Arrow / A - Moves the player to the left
Back Arrow / S - Moves the player backward
Right Arrow / D - Moves the player to the right

Space - Jump

Escape Key - Exits the game
